description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in starnet/editors/htmlarea/popups/images.php in Site@School (S@S) 2.4.02 and earlier allows remote attackers to upload and execute arbitrary files with executable extensions.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4922

description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in search.php in eSyndiCat Portal System allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the what parameter.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4923

description: sshd in OpenSSH before 4.4, when using the version 1 SSH protocol, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (CPU consumption) via an SSH packet that contains duplicate blocks, which is not properly handled by the CRC compensation attack detector.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4924

description: packet.c in ssh in OpenSSH allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (crash) by sending an invalid protocol sequence with USERAUTH_SUCCESS before NEWKEYS, which causes newkeys[mode] to be NULL.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4925

description: The Database module in Moodle before 1.6.2 does not properly handle uploaded files, which has unspecified impact and remote attack vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4935

description: Moodle before 1.6.2 does not properly validate the module instance id when creating a course module object, which has unspecified impact and remote attack vectors.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4936

description: lib/setup.php in Moodle before 1.6.2 sets the error reporting level to 7 to display E_WARNING messages to users even if debugging is disabled, which might allow remote authenticated users to obtain sensitive information by triggering the messages.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4937

description: help.php in Moodle before 1.6.2 does not check the existence of certain help files before including them, which might allow remote authenticated users to obtain the path in an error message.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4938

description: backup/backup_scheduled.php in Moodle before 1.6.2 generates trace data with the full backup pathname even when debugging is disabled, which might allow attackers to obtain the pathname.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4939

description: login/forgot_password.php in Moodle before 1.6.2 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information (e-mail addresses and Moodle account names) via a find action.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4940

description: Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Moodle before 1.6.2 might allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via (1) the choose parameter in files/index.php and (2) the sub parameter in doc/index.php.

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4941

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4942

cvss3.cvss3_url: No Common Vulnerability Scoring System Version for CVE=CVE-2006-4949
